p:
We will use the recovery rate
ν
to set the unit of time, fixing
ν = 1
in rescaled units. The remaining parameters of the model are (1) the transmission rate
β
- in our units the number of transmission events per infection and hence equal to the basic reproduction number
R 0
, (2) the mutation rate
m
, (3) the range of cross-immunity
d
measured as the typical number of mutations needed for an
e
-fold drop of cross-inhibition, and (4) the host population size
N h
.
